definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: mng. Unknown;—only s. et pl. [[שִׁדָּה וְשִׁדּוֹת]] Ec 2:8, apparently appos. Of [[תַּעֲנגֻוֹת]] (LXX oi)noco/on Kai\ oi)noco/av, i.e. [[שׁׂדֶה וְשׁׂדוֹת]], from Aram. [[שְׁדָא]] pour out [but not spec. of wine]; Aq. Kuli/kion Kai\ Kuli/kia (cf. Vulgate), prob. fr. same √; Dl:Prol. 97 Kö:ii. 1. 161 Wildeb Siegf cp. As. šadâdu, love (Siegf ‘Haremsperlen’), but this word lacks evidence; poss. [[שָׂרָה וְשָׁרוֹת]], v. I. [[שָׂרָה]] p. 979
